metadata.description: It's like we're suspended in time. Pandemic fatigue: an endless state of purgatory, an endless transition. A sense of infinity. Permanent crisis. Suspended life. The days we live leave a bitter taste in our mouths; The feeling of being stuck in the moment erodes our joy of life. We must take our souls from the numbing stupor of anxiety, and hold on to whatever shows a sign of joy and vitality in life.
metadata.name: Untitled NFT #1/1
